wikipedia_page.main:
Leyla Gediz (born 1974) is a Turkish artist.
Gediz grew up in İstanbul. She studied at the Chelsea College of Art and Design, the Slade School of Fine Arts, and Goldsmiths College, University of London, receiving an MA in Visual Arts.In 1995 and 1997 Gediz won 1st prize in the Slade School's Still Life Competition. In 2003 her work was included in the Where?, Here?, Turkish Art Today at The Museum of Modern Art, Saitama, Japan. In 2010 her work was included in the A Dream…but not yours: Contemporary Art from Turkey at the National Museum of Women in the Arts, Washington, DC.
